countedref.h

00001 #ifndef COUNTEDREF__H
00002 #define COUNTEDREF__H
00003 
00004 
00006 template <class T> class CountedRef {
00007 
00008   private :
00009     T* p;
00010 
00011  public:
00012 
00013   CountedRef() { p = NULL;}
00014   CountedRef(T* pp) : p(pp) { if (p) (p->refCount())++;}
00015   /* explicit constness violation : */
00016   CountedRef(const T* pp)  { p = (T*) pp;  if (p) (p->refCount())++;}
00017 
00018   void operator = (const CountedRef &Right) 
00019     {  
00020       if (p) {(p->refCount())--;if (p->refCount() == 0) delete p;}
00021       if (&Right) { p = Right.p; if (p) (p->refCount())++;}
00022     }
00023   CountedRef(const CountedRef &Other) { p = NULL; *this = Other;}
00024 
00025   operator const T*() const {return p;}
00026   operator T*() { return p;}
00027   T* operator->() { return p;}
00028   const T* operator->() const { return p;}
00029   T& operator*() { return *p;}
00030   const T& operator*() const { return *p;}
00031 
00032 #ifndef __CINT__
00033   bool operator == (const CountedRef<T> &Right) const {return p == Right.p;}
00034   bool operator == (const T* Right) const {return p == Right;}
00035   bool operator != (const CountedRef<T> &Right) const {return p != Right.p;}
00036   bool operator != (const T* Right) const {return p != Right;}
00037 
00038 #ifndef SWIG
00039   template <class A> operator A*() { return dynamic_cast<A*>(p);}
00040   template <class A> operator const A*() const { return dynamic_cast<const A*>(p);}
00041 #endif /*SWIG */
00042 
00043 #endif /* __CINT__ */
00044 
00045   ~CountedRef() 
00046     { 
00047       if (!p) return;
00048       (p->refCount())--;
00049       // tentative check :
00050       if (p->refCount() < 0) {cerr << " problem in ~RefCount: aborting "  << endl; abort();}
00051       if (p->refCount() == 0) 
00052         {delete p;} 
00053     }
00054 };
00055 
00056 
00057 class RefCount {
00058  private:
00059   int refcount;
00060   public :
00061     RefCount() :refcount(0) {};
00062   int& refCount()       {return refcount;}
00063   //  int  refCount() const {return refcount;}
00064   
00065   /* when a RefCount is copied, it means that the object itself is copied,
00066      hence the count sould be set to zero */
00067   RefCount(const RefCount &Other) 
00068     { 
00069       if (&Other) {}; // warning killer
00070       refcount = 0;
00071     }
00072   void operator = (const RefCount & Right)
00073     {
00074       if (&Right) {}; // warning killer
00075     }
00076 
00077 };
00078 
00079 #endif /*COUNTEDREF__H */
